ext_descriptions.ext_description:
The alias_identification_item type is an extensible list of alternate data types. It provides a mechanism to refer to instances of the data types included in the types that extend the alias_identification_item type.
This empty extensible select requires extension in a further module to ensure that all entities have at least one valid instantiation.
The type alias_identification_item is not an extension of the type identification_item, defined in the module Identification_assignment, because the capability to get an alias may not be needed for every entity type to which the capability to get additional identifiers is provided. By nature, alias_identification_item characterizes a smaller set of entity types than identification_item.

An Alias_identification is a type of Identification_assignment that provides an alias identifier to product data. The alias identifier is conveyed within the identifier attribute inherited from Identification_assignment.
Information about the organizational scope in which the alias applies may be provided by a specialization of Organization_or_person_in_organization_assignment.
Alias identification only applies to concepts that possesses an attribute that conveys an identifier.
The inherited role attribute gets the value 'alias';
The inherited items attribute shall not contain any element that is not aliasable.
